Revert "wifi: mac80211: fix memory leak in ieee80211_if_add()"

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.1.8 by commit effecd8d116d3d3a28b4f628e61bba8d318fdfcf, it was introduced in version v6.1.2 by commit 9a50a7f64243bd21a84353c371f3977b9ffd9fa5. For more details please see the references link.
